response.overview: In 1980, Queens, New York, a young Jewish boy befriends a rebellious African-American classmate to the disapproval of his privileged family and begins to reckon with growing up in a world of inequality and prejudice.
response.tagline: The end of an era. The beginning of everything.
response.title: Armageddon Time

release_dates.note: Athens International Film and Video Festival
Middleburg Film Festival & Newport Beach International Film Festival
